articles.title: Pound slumps to all-time low against dollar - BBC
articles.description: Sterling plunged by 4% in early Asia trade to the lowest level since decimalisation in 1971.
articles.content:
By Monica Miller & Peter HoskinsBusiness reporters
The pound has fallen to its lowest level against the US dollar since decimalisation in 1971.

articles.description: Yuki Onishi was the founder and head chef at Tsuta ramen, which has three outlets in Singapore.
articles.content:
